price: Mu by’ukuri ibiremwa bibi imbere ya Allah ni ibipfamatwi (abanze kumva ukuri) bakaba n’ibiragi (indimi zabo zanze kwatura ukwemera); ba bandi badatekereza.
arabic: ۞ إِنَّ شَرَّ ٱلدَّوَآبِّ عِندَ ٱللَّهِ ٱلصُّمُّ ٱلۡبُكۡمُ ٱلَّذِينَ لَا يَعۡقِلُونَ

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: inna sharra al-dawābi ʿinda al-lahi al-ṣumu al-buk'mu alladhīna lā yaʿqilūna
